page.title: 02A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content:
A FAMILY WEEKEND
Saturday:In the morning I pretend to be asleep when my mum gets up.She shouts me and I leap out of bed and get dressed into my jeans and jumper. We live in Ruskington and there are three people in my family, my mother brother and me.For breakfast we have cornflakes. Cornflakes are orange and they are made out of corn.After that I get washed,brush my hair and clean my teeth.To occupy myself I get my organ out and mess about playing little tunes .Then I get my magazine out called SMASH HITS and cut out any pictures of FRANKIE GOES TO HOLLYWOOD, a well_known pop group.We go down the village and go into the sweet shop, Co_op,Spar and the grocers.We come
